projects.title: Artificial Intelligence on the Edge with Robotics (AIER)
projects.description: Project Manager for the design and development of a conversational robot cannon on embedded devices.

projects.title: Policy Generalization via Multi-modal Skill Transfer
projects.description: Developing a continual learning algorithm for skill-based agents, focusing on bidirectional knowledge transfer and multi-modal skill adaptation.

projects.title: Self-directed Multimodal Intelligence for Solving Unknown, Open-Domain Problems
projects.description: Conducting research on continual imitation learning with unlearning. Developing a diffusion-based policy architecture for few-shot imitation learning.

projects.title: Adaptive Personality for Intelligent Agents
projects.description: Developing a multimodal semantic skill learning framework for a one-shot imitation learning algorithm in non-stationary environments.

projects.title: Federated Reinforcement Learning for Fast Adaptation
projects.description: Developing a federated reinforcement learning framework and learning scenarios. Focusing on multi-task reinforcement learning and meta-learning algorithms for task adaptation.
